Title: Voyager 1's Glitch: A Space Odyssey's New Challenge #shorts
Description: Discover the latest challenge facing Voyager 1, humanity's farthest space probe. With a glitch in its communication system, what does the future hold for this iconic explorer? #Voyager1 #SpaceExploration #NASA #shorts

Scenes.VoiceOverText: So unfortunately, I may have some really sad space news. The Voyager 1, humanity's farthest space probe, is experiencing a glitch.
